sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { WidgetService } from './services/widget.service'; import { BlueComponent } from './blue/blue.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { constructor( private widgetService: WidgetService, ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.listWidgets() const aaa = this.loadDynamicComponent('blue'); console.log('aaa:', aaa) } listWidgets() { this.widgetService.listWidgets('assets/widgets.json').subscribe(data => { console.log(data) }); } // loadDynamicComponent(type: string): any { private async loadDynamicComponent(type: string): Promise { // const widgetModule = await import(`./${type}/${type}.module`) // return new widgetModule.BlueModule.BlueComponent const widgetModule = await import(`./blue/blue.module`) const hoge = widgetModule.BlueModule } }
